TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Contains data associated with a workflow change that occurs during the execution of a workflow instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
When a workflow change occurs during the execution of a workflow instance and a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with the workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> to TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
> [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.

Docs.summary: Gets the changes that occurred to the workflow instance.
Docs.value: A list of objects that specify the changes that occurred to the workflow instance.
An that represents the root activity of the workflow instance.
